sense.gloss: to flow out, to stream out, to pour out, to gush forth, to leak, to ooze out, to drift away

sdata.j: その↑結果↑↓けっか↓、↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓れば、↑大量↑↓たいりょう↓の↑表土↑↓ひょうど↓、↑赤土↑↓あかつち↓、↑化学↑↓かがく↓↑肥料↑↓ひりょう↓、↑農薬↑↓のうやく↓が、↑海↑↓うみ↓に↑流↑↓|なが↓れだす|。
sdata.e: As a result, when it rains, large amounts of topsoil, clay, chemical fertilizers, and pesticides are washed into the sea.
